conversation.message: That is a fantastic question, Parent_C, and one that speaks directly to our commitment to a smooth start for every child. Our transition process is highly individualized, beginning with a 'settling-in' period. We schedule several short preparatory visits with the parent present, gradually increasing the child's time alone. Each child is assigned a key worker who serves as the primary emotional anchor and communication bridge during this phase, ensuring consistency and security. Regarding daily updates, we utilize a dedicated nursery app for real-time communication. This includes daily digital diaries detailing meals, sleep, activities, and photos. We also prioritize face-to-face communication during drop-off and pick-up times for quick verbal updates. We aim for complete transparency and partnership throughout your child's journey with us. Based on our extensive discussions, do you feel our approach aligns well with your family's needs?
